title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing the 'copy package' operation in the package viewer of org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3, some unexpected behavior is observed. The bug occurs when the following steps are performed: Selecting the package and choosing 'copy' from the context menu.
OB: The observed behavior is not mentioned in the bug report.
EB: The expected behavior is not mentioned in the bug report.
SR: To reproduce the bug, follow these steps: 1. Create a new project named xxx. 2. In the package viewer, select a package in project A. For example, right-click on the package and choose 'copy' from the context menu. 4. Perform any additional necessary steps.
